original_texts.loc_ans: когда человек, замечая, что человек на фотографии привлекателен, ухожен и правильно одет, предполагает, используя мысленную эвристику, что человек на фотографии - хороший человек, основываясь на правилах социальной концепции этого человека

translated_texts.src: What family did Ptychagnostidae belong to?
translated_texts.rephrase: What was the family Ptychagnostidae?
translated_texts.loc: Is this one of the command halo effects?
translated_texts.loc_ans: when a person, noticing that the person in the photo is attractive, well-groomed and properly dressed, assumes, using mental heuristics, that the person in the photo is a good person, based on the rules of the social concept of that person
translated_texts.new_question: What is the common name of the insect family that Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly considered to be a part of?

en_texts.src: Which was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.rephrase: What was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.loc: nq question: which is one effect of the team halo effect?
en_texts.loc_ans: when an individual noticing that the person in the photograph is attractive, well groomed, and properly attired, assumes, using a mental heuristic, that the person in the photograph is a good person based upon the rules of that individual’s social concept

portability.New Question: What is the common name of the insect family that Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly believed to be a part of?
